original_title: Colosseum - The Complete Reunion Concert Cologne 1994
overview: Reunion concert by Colosseum at the Freiburg Zelt-Musik-Festival in June 1994.  Original band members Chris Farlowe (vocals), Dick Heckstall-Smith (saxes), Clem Clempson (guitars) and Dave Greenslade (keyboards) were joined by Mark Clarke (vocals)
title: Colosseum - The Complete Reunion Concert Cologne 1994
